description: Styx is 21-years old, stands 5' 9 and weighs about 175 lbs. He's been in the Marines for over three years. He says this weekend has really made him do some thinking about what he's going to do when he gets out of the Marine Corps and he's pretty sure this business is for him. I personally love the sound of that idea. This guy knows how to pull out all the stops and he's gonna drive you crazy that I am sure of. When he bends over and shows off that beautiful fucking ass and that sweet hole you're gonna lose all sanity and probably everything else.
title: Styx, Scene #01
